trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Attended a NATO Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Saudi Foreign Minister Adel al-Jubeir.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with King Abdullah II and Jordanian Foreign Minister Ayman al-Safadi. Also met with Japanese Foreign Minister Taro Kono.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Chairman Kim Jong-un and other North Korean Government officials. Also secured the release of three Americans.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Trump to the G–7 meetings.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the President’s summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un and bilateral events with Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with senior Korean and Japanese officials to discuss the U.S.-Republic of Korea alliance, the U.S.-Japan alliance, and next steps in our shared approach to North Korea.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Chinese officials on bilateral, regional, and global issues that affect both countries.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Continued consultations and implementation of the forward progress made by President Trump and Chairman Kim in Singapore.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Japanese and South Korean leaders to discuss our shared commitment to the final, fully verified denuclearization of the DPRK, as well as other bilateral and regional issues.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with senior Vietnamese officials to discuss our shared commitment to the final, fully verified denuclearization of the DPRK and other bilateral and regional issues.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Afghan officials.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with UAE leaders to discuss ways to further strengthen the U.S.-UAE partnership.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Trump to the NATO Summit and also participated in the U.S.-EU Energy Council and co-hosted a meeting of foreign ministers of the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Enrique Peña Nieto, Foreign Secretary Luis Videgaray Caso, and President-elect Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Trump to his meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Also met with Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov and Finnish Foreign Minister Timo Soini, to discuss bilateral and regional issues.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with senior Malaysian officials to discuss strengthening the Comprehensive Partnership and advancing common security and economic interests.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in annual ASEAN-centered ministerial meetings.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with senior Indonesian officials to discuss U.S.-Indonesia Strategic Partnership.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Imran Khan, Foreign Minister Qureshi, and Chief of Army Staff Qamar Javed Bajwa to discuss U.S.-Pakistan bilateral relations.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the inaugural U.S.-India “2+2” dialogue and met with senior officials.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and Foreign Minister Taro Kono.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Chairman Kim Jong-un.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Moon Jae-in, and Foreign Minister Kang Kyung-wha.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Chinese counterparts to discuss bilateral, regional, and global issues.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman and Foreign Minister Adel al-Jubeir regarding the investigation into the disappearance of Jamal Khashoggi.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Juan Carlos Varela and Vice President and Foreign Minister Isabel de Saint Malo de Alvarado to discuss ongoing U.S.-Panama collaboration on regional priorities.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Enrique Peña Nieto, Foreign Secretary Luis Videgaray Caso, and Foreign Secretary-designate Marcelo Luis Ebrard Casaubon.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Joined President Trump in commemorating the 100th anniversary of the end of the WWI. Also participated in the President’s meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Supported President Trump’s participation in the G20 Leaders’ Summit.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the semi-annual meeting of NATO Foreign Ministers and also met with Belgian Prime Minister Charles Michel.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Orbán and Foreign Minister Szijjártó.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Kiska, Prime Minister Pellegrini, and Foreign Minister Lajčák.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Minister Czaputowicz.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Federica Mogherini.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Jakobsdóttir and Foreign Minister Thórdarson.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the President’s summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un and bilateral meetings with Vietnamese leaders.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Rodrigo Duterte and Secretary of Foreign Affairs Teodoro Locsin, Jr.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Led the U.S. delegation at the third U.S.-Kuwait Strategic Dialogue.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Israeli officials to engage on critical regional issues.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Lebanese leaders to discuss political, security, economic, and humanitarian challenges.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Piñera and Foreign Minister Ampuero.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Abdo Benítez and Foreign Minister Castiglioni.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Vizcarra and Foreign Minister Popolizio.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Visited entities supporting Venezuelan refugees and assessed the challenges due to the closed border.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the Eleventh Ministerial Meeting of the Arctic Council and delivered a speech on U.S. Arctic policy.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Iraqi Prime Minister Adil Abd al-Mahdi and Iraqi President Barham Salih.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Theresa May and Foreign Secretary Jeremy Hunt to discuss shared global priorities, and gave a speech on the U.S.‑UK Special Relationship.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with European allies to discuss recent threatening actions and statements by the Islamic Republic of Iran.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov and President Vladimir Putin.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Chancellor Angela Merkel and Foreign Minister Heiko Maas.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis, Swiss business leaders, and World Health Organization Director General Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the opening of the Global Entrepreneurship Summit with Prime Minister Mark Rutte and met with Foreign Minister Stef Blok.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Joined President Trump's state visit to the United Kingdom.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud and Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Ashraf Ghani, Chief Executive Abdullah Abdullah, former President Hamid Karzai, and others to discuss next steps in the Afghan Peace Process.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Minister of External Affairs S. Jaishankar to discuss the U.S.-India strategic partnership.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in the G–20 Leaders’ Summit.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Joined President Trump’s meeting with President Moon Jae-in.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Joined regional leaders for the Second Western Hemisphere Counterterrorism Ministerial.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Lenín Moreno and Foreign Minister José Valencia.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Secretary Marcelo Ebrard.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Nayib Bukele.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Co-chaired the U.S.-Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Ministerial and held a bilateral meeting with Foreign Minister Don Pramudwinai.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Led the U.S. delegation to the Australia-United States Ministerial Consultations and met with Prime Minister Scott Morrison.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with the leaders of the Federated States of Micronesia, the Republic of the Marshall Islands, and the Republic of Palau in the first-ever visit by a Secretary of State to the Federated States of Micronesia.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Foreign Minister Chrystia Freeland.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Belgian Prime Minister and European Council President-elect Michel, NATO Secretary General Stoltenberg, European Parliament President Sassoli, European Commission President-elect von der Leyen, and Acting Spanish Foreign Minister Josep Borrell.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Sergio Mattarella, Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, and Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Audience with His Holiness Pope Francis and met with Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with President Milo Djukanovic, Prime Minister Dusko Markovic, and Foreign Minister Srdjan Darmanovic.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis, Foreign Minister Nikos Dendias, and Defense Minister Nikolaos Panagiotopoulos.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in a meeting with Vice President Mike Pence and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan to discuss the situation in northeast Syria.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to discuss developments in Syria.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Participated in events to commemorate the end of the Cold War and met with German Foreign Minister Heiko Maas.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with German Chancellor Angela Merkel and commemorated the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Led the U.S. delegation to the NATO Foreign Ministerial.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Joined U.S. delegation led by President Trump to attend the NATO Leaders Meeting.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister António Costa and Foreign Minister Augusto Santos Silva.

trip.name: Michael R. Pompeo
trip.remarks: Met with senior government officials.
